str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To act unjustly towards, injure, harm. From adikos; to be unjust, i.e. do wrong.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Or, its prolonged form opheileo probably from the base of ophelos; to owe; figuratively, to be under obligation; morally, to fail in duty.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To charge to, put to one's account, impute. From en and logos; to reckon in, i.e. Attribute.
